Posts.Content: I had  a mammogram,ultrasound, and an MRI.  Now they want to do a Biopsy.  Should I be concerned?  I have know idea what the heck is going on, I am so confussed!!!!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: So many test, I am confussed!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: Thanks, I don't feel brave.  I want to cry, scream, and run away.  But none of those are options.  I have young adult children and several grandchildren and they all need me.  I am constantly doing things for others to keep my mind busy.  I just hate the wait.  Last MRI the surgeon said there was nothing to worry about and now I am advised to do the biopsy.  I was prepared to tell them I want it out, but not told to have it removed.  My husband has his head in the sand, he is just saying that everything is going to be fine don't worry.  I am looking just for a place to vent and ask questions.  I really don't know if I should be worried or just muttle through until everything is resolved.
Posts.Title: So many test, I am confussed!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: I just went for a second opinion, my ob/gyn did not even tell me that I had a lump still.  I just keep losing weight, 40 pounds now, and no one can tell me why.  One doctor told me what ever reason, it was not killing me so don't worry.  My mom had BC at 35 and I am now 38, I already have had a lump removed and other lumps form.  I feel the doctor thinks I am over reacting, but then I think these are not things going on with him so why would he be worried.  I don't know, just getting more worried.  My mom keeps saying it is nothing, my husband says nothing, my daughter is buying me wigs, and my sister-in-law has me in the grave.  There is no time for me to process everything in between all of them and on top of this I babysit my grand-daughter every night while my daughter works.  Just no time to breath!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: So many test, I am confussed!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: Hi  I am writing to give you the hope we all need from time to time.  My mom was diagnosed with BC, 27 years ago and is still a survivor.  No cancer has come back in her body.  She was diagnosed with a very tiny tumor and all was removed.  She was lucky, but really all her kids were the lucky ones, we were all little.  you will make it, you just have to believe
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy

Posts.Content: My mom had the lymph nodes removed 30 years ago and is fine.  She goes by being careful with no blood being drawn, careful to injure, slow to heal.  I only know if my test I am having come back positive i want the same surgery she had.  She was 35 and now she is 67 and has never shown signs of the cancer returning.
Posts.Title: Questions about upcoming surgery

Posts.Content: I have been going to the doctor for month for losing weight, my breast getting large all of a sudden (2 sizes), pain shooting down my arm, breast itchy, and overall I just feel bad.  I have been told it is all in my head and what ever it is it is not killing me.  I had a mammogram and hormne testing done and everything comes out normal.  I just heard of IBC, should I go back to the doctor again and have them look for this?  I have been told the same thing by two doctors that some women just have a larger breast.  HELP, I feel like I am going crazy!
Posts.Title: IBC

Posts.Content: i went to a new dr. on thursday, he is sending me for a MRI and doing the brca1 test tomorrow.  I won't know anything for a week,  still getting skinny and full of nerves.  these dr. move on their schedule, not ours.  I can't sleep any more, not even with the med to calm me down all these thoughts keep  going through my head.  I have 4 grandbabies and want to see them walk, talk, laugh, play, just grow in general and be able to do this with them.  Hope they figure this all out quickly.  This has been going on for months.  I did find out that a lump in my left breast is still there and has enlarged since the last mammogram, no one else ever told me this.  I get so mad that i feel like i am never told what is going on.
Posts.Title: IBC
